para.text: in an application, the following xml configuration is used:
for integration with the application config;
Addition of Options Panel to the Options plugin
contains an example of how to add the toolbar to the Map Gui:
To load a configuration on the start of an application, a special xml file can be provided. The name and location of this file is configurable in the plugin by the properties
The default is config.xml in the raster_symbols_core module.

This file is read when the plugin is initiated. One or more <configuration> tags can be defined. It reads the configuration and will load the defined Raster Symbol configuration files with symbols, mappings and properties if the value for the attribute autoload is true. If the attribute overwrite is true, it will replace existing symbols, mapping and options.
